name: Emberhold Village
description: A highland village nestled in a mountain valley, known for its master blacksmiths and the Ancient Forge. Stone buildings with slate roofs line the narrow streets, and a large central hearth - normally housing the Ember Crystal - stands empty in the village square. The atmosphere is tense as villagers worry about the coming winter without the crystal's warmth.

connectedLocations.description: The legendary forge sits at the northern edge of the village, built into the mountain itself.
A winding path leads from the eastern edge of the village up into the mountains where the Crystal Caverns can be found.

pointsOfInterest.name: The Empty Hearth
pointsOfInterest.description: A large circular stone platform in the center of the village square, designed to hold the Ember Crystal. The platform now sits empty, with only a few embers still glowing faintly.

pointsOfInterest.name: Thorin's Supplies
pointsOfInterest.description: A well-stocked trading post run by Merchant Thorin, offering goods from surrounding regions as well as local crafts.

pointsOfInterest.name: Elder's Hut
pointsOfInterest.description: A modest stone building with intricate carvings, home to Elder Varric who leads the village council.
